titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7321) to authorize financial assistance to eligible automobile manufacturers, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7321) to authorize financial assistance to eligible automobile manufacturers, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-922, by Ms. Slaughter.

The amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying the resolution, if offered by Representative LaTourette of Ohio or his designee, shall be in order without intervention of any point of order; shall be considered as read; shall be separately debatable for 10 minutes equally divided and controlled by the proponent and an opponent and shall not be subject to a demand for a division of the question.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 290.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1534.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 180, 1 Present (Roll no. 687).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 179, 1 Present (Roll no. 688).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7321) to authorize financial assistance to eligible automobile manufacturers.
